name: solidinvoice
description: SolidInvoice is a self-hosted invoicing and billing application for freelancers and small businesses. It supports quotes, recurring invoices, payments, and client management.
features: Invoice creation: Generates professional invoices with customizable templates.
Quote management: Creates quotes that convert to invoices upon acceptance.
Recurring invoices: Automates billing for subscriptions and retainer clients.
Payment tracking: Records payments and tracks outstanding balances.
Client management: Maintains client database with contact and billing information.
Tax calculations: Handles multiple tax rates and automatic tax calculations.
Payment gateways: Integrates with PayPal, Stripe, and other payment processors.
Expense tracking: Records business expenses and attaches to projects.
Time tracking: Logs billable hours and converts to invoice line items.
Multi-currency: Supports invoicing in multiple currencies with exchange rates.
Email notifications: Sends invoice and payment reminders automatically.
Reporting: Generates financial reports for income, expenses, and taxes.
